alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 12:38PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wakulla, west central Jefferson and southeastern Leon Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1237 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Woodville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Florida State University, Florida A and M, Tallahassee Community College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Lake Bradford, Ralford Greenway, Cody, Gaither Community Center, Lake Munson, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Walker Ford Community Center, South City, Eight Mile Pond, Chaires, Callen Neighborhood, Bethel, Tallahassee Regional A/P and State Capital Complex. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
